00048 template <class Attribute>
00049 TAttributeStaticInfo<Attribute>::TAttributeStaticInfo(
00050                      icomp::CBaseComponentStaticInfo& staticInfo,
00051                      const std::string& id,
00052                      const std::string& description,
00053                      const Attribute* defaultValuePtr,

00055                      const istd::CClassInfo& relatedInterfaceInfo)

00098 template <class Attribute>
00099 IComponentStaticInfo::Ids TAttributeStaticInfo<Attribute>::GetRelatedMetaIds(int metaGroupId, int flags, int flagsMask) const
00100 {
00101        IComponentStaticInfo::Ids retVal;
00102 
00103        if (metaGroupId == IComponentStaticInfo::MGI_INTERFACES){
00104               if (((m_attributeFlags & flagsMask) == flags) && !m_relatedInterfaceType.IsVoid()){
00105                      retVal.insert(m_relatedInterfaceType.GetName());
00106               }
00107        }
00108 
00109        return retVal;
00110 }
